item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0264; 07:24AM; 630 S San Pedro St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3LGZL93; Downtown; KNOCKDOWN: Over 100 firefighters extinguished the fire in 43mins. Firefighters made quick progress against fire encountered on the first floor, however the blaze had already extended from the 2nd into the attic. Truck companies on the roof conducted vertical ventilation, getting heavy fire from the holes and venting some of the heat while fire attack made their way up to conduct direct attack on the attic fire. Their coordinated efforts alleviated the need to go to a defensive mode and prevented the total loss of the structure. Preliminary information is this was an outside fire which extended in. However, protocol for a Major Emergency fire calls for LAFD Arson investigators to conduct a cause investigation and they are enroute to do so. No injuries reported. No further details.; FS 9; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; AR1 AR33 BC1 BC11 BC13 BC18 BC5 CM21 CM22 E11 E14 E17 E20 E201 E202 E203 E209 E210 E211 E227 E229 E235 E26 E27 E3 E9 EA1 EA2 EM1 EM11 EM2 HR3 PI1 RA209 RA27 RA809 RA827 RA9 SQ21 T1 T10 T11 T2 T27 T29 T3 T35 T9 UR27 UR88; CH9; 13 14; Margaret Stewart

Update Structure Fire; INC#0264; 07:09AM; 630 S San Pedro St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3LGZL93; Downtown; This incident is now at the Major Emergency status with over 100 firefighters assigned. Firefighters made access and were able to make good progress against fire on the first floor however the fire extended up into the 2nd floor to the attic. There is now heavy fire in the attic. Access to that area is proving challenging. One additional task force requested. No injuries reported. LAFD PIO Captain Erik Scott is on scene for media availability.; FS 9; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 BC13 BC18 BC5 CM22 E11 E14 E17 E201 E203 E209 E210 E211 E227 E27 E3 E9 EA1 EA2 EM1 EM11 HR3 RA209 RA27 RA809 RA827 SQ21 T1 T10 T11 T27 T3 T9 UR27 UR88; CH9; 13 14; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0264; 06:41AM; 630 S San Pedro; MAP: https://bit.ly/3gYxmx2; Downtown; Two story, commercial building (DBA ABC Toys) with an outside fire that extended into the structure and moderate smoke showing. Two additional task forces requested. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 9; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 E203 E209 E3 E9 RA209 RA809 SQ21 T3 T9; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0853; 01:44PM; 13640 N Norris Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3JDtGwW; Sylmar; A one-story 1,615 sq-ft home built in 1971 caught fire, which appeared to have started in a nearby carport, spreading to the adjacent home and nearby ornamental vegetation, encouraged by windy conditions. Firefighters ensured all occupants escaped and received a medical assessment. Thankfully, no injuries or medical complaints were found. It took the first 38 firefighters 33 minutes to extinguish all flames in the home, carport, vegetation, and autos involved. Cause under investigation.; FS 91; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; AO1 AO2 BC10 BC12 BC14 CM42 E18 E273 E275 E28 E287 E289 E298 E75 E89 E90 E91 EM12 H3 HA3 HR3 RA75 RA889 RA89 RA891 RA91 T73 T75 T87 T89 T98 UR88 UR89; CH8; 17 18; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0853; 01:11PM; 13640 N Norris Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3JDtGwW; Sylmar; One-story single-family home with heavy fire showing.; FS 91; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 E18 E275 E287 E298 E75 E91 RA75 RA891 RA91 T75 T87 T98; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0032; 12:50AM; 7816 S Flight Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Bt2VZh; Westchester; Firefighters found smoke coming from attic vents upon arrival. Crews forced entry and developed hose lines on the ground, as others made their way to the roof. A coordinated attack by 30 firefighters extinguished the flames in one room (with some extension into the wall and attic) in 17 minutes. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 5; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC4 E205 E263 E295 E5 E51 E95 RA5 RA95 T5 T63 T95; CH9; 13 14; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0032; 12:33AM; 7816 S Flight Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Bt2VZh; Westchester; One-story home with smoke showing. Offensive mode.; FS 5; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC4 E205 E295 E5 E95 RA5 RA95 T5 T95; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1383; 08:37PM; 240 E 57th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3gTBrm9; South Park; Seventy-four LAFD firefighters battled a blaze in a one-story commercial blaze containing a marijuana grow operation. After firefighters transitioned back to defensive operations, there was a partial roof/mezzanine collapse inside, where debris initially hindered firefighters from fully extinguishing all hot spots within the rubble. LAFD USAR specialists on scene provided expertise for firefighters to safely and cautiously move into position to finish extinguishing the remaining burning materials. Firefighters achieved final extinguishment 84 minutes after the time of alarm. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 33; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC1 BC11 BC13 BC18 CM22 CM32 E14 E15 E203 E21 E211 E221 E233 E266 E3 E33 E46 E64 E66 EA1 EM11 FP354 HR3 JT6 RA21 RA33 RA833 RA846 SQ21 T11 T21 T3 T33 T66 UR3 UR88; CH7; 13 14; Nicholas Prange

Update Structure Fire; INC#1383; 07:26PM; 240 E 57th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3gTBrm9; South Park; Additional units have been requested. Firefighters on the roof created ventilation holes. Smoke conditions have intensified and now heavy fire showing through the roof. The incident commander ordered crews off the roof and out of the structure, transitioning to defensive mode (fighting the fire from the exterior only). Crews are setting up ladder pipe operations.; FS 33; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC1 BC11 BC13 BC18 CM22 E14 E15 E203 E21 E221 E233 E266 E3 E33 E46 E66 EM11 HR3 RA21 RA833 RA846 SQ21 T21 T3 T33 T66 UR3 UR88; CH9; 13 14; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1383; 07:13PM; 240 E 57th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3gTBrm9; South Park; Flames appear to have spread from an adjacent auto fire into a one-story commercial building. Offensive mode.; FS 33; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC11 BC13 E14 E221 E233 E33 E46 E66 RA21 RA833 RA846 SQ21 T21 T33; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange
